name: WP Reactions Lite
author: WP Reactions, LLC

sections.description:
WP Reactions Lite is the best animated emoji reaction plugin for WordPress. A lightweight plugin that increases user engagement and social sharing. Simply turn them on and they go to work for you.

Our plugin will keep your audience engaged on pages and posts for longer. Increases User Engagement, Social Sharing, Collects User Data and increases on page sessions resulting in better SEO.

One click activation deploys your emoji reactions site wide. You decide what pages and posts you want them on by choosing your options in our easy admin panel.

USE Reactions for Voting, Feedback, Social Plugin, Collecting user emotional data and more. Increases on page user sessions 15 seconds resulting in improved SEO. You get 14 SVG and 14 Lottie Animated Emojis All the tools you need to create real-time user engagement with your audience.

OUR FEATURES ARE DESIGNED FOR REAL-TIME USER ENGAGEMENT AND SOCIAL SHARING

  • 14 Lottie Animated Lightning Fast, Limited Edition Ver 2.0 Emojis
  • 14 Lightning fast SVG files, Limited Edition Ver 2.0 Emojis
  • Emoji picker lets you choose your favorite emoji lineup
  • Drag and Drop to arrange your emoji reactions
  • Flying animated user counts when your audience clicks to vote
  • Personalize and customize your social sharing buttons
  • Collect user analytics to understand your audience’s emotions
  • Live counters register user expressions and reactions
  • Overhead badges with custom color and styling options
  • Facebook, Twitter, Telegram and Email social sharing
  • Customize with our design step wizard
  • Set fake counts to your desired number
  • On-page options to position your reactions perfectly
  • One click-activation deploys your emojis site wide
  • Get more with WP Reactions Pro
  • [Premium] 200 JoyPixels Lottie Animated Emojis
  • [Premium] 200 JoyPixels SVG Static Emojis
  • [Premium] 12 Top Desktop and Mobile Social Sharing Platforms
  • [Premium] NEW Layouts for your Blog
  • [Premium] Shortcode Generator to put your emojis anywhere
  • And, tons of ways to customize and engage your users with extended premium features that deliver a great user experience for you and your audience. No coding skills required.

NOTES

Premium features are only included in the Pro Version of this plugin. You can visit our DEMO Site to test drive our Pro Version to see what your missing.

Support

Visit our website to view our extensive documentation. Or, access the WordPress forum to get answers to your questions.

REPORT BUGS

If you encounter any bug, please use the feedback form inside of plugin to report.
sections.installation:
1. Navigate to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Click the Upload Plugin button at the top of the screen.
  3. Select the zip file from your local filesystem.
  4. Click the Install Now button.

When installation is complete, you’ll see “Plugin installed successfully.” Click the Activate Plugin button at the bottom of the page.

  1. Once WP Reactions plugin is activated, navigate to plugin dashboard to enter license key.
sections.faq:
Can I choose the page and posts I want Reactions on?

Yes. You can easily do this by choosing manual mode while customizing your reactions. After this option is selected, you can go to each page and manage your reactions.

Do I need any coding skills for this plugin?

No Coding Skills Required. We built WP Reactions for all users at all skill levels. Our step wizard will guide you through to make sure your reactions look great on your pages and posts.

Are these emojis Gifs or Lottie Animation?

Our emojis are the highest quality Lottie animation. They are fast loading and deliver a great user experience for your audience. Our emojis look fantastic on any color background.

What Social Sharing platforms are integrated?

You can choose from Facebook, Twitter and Email sharing. To add social options, please visit our main website.

Can I disable Social Sharing?

Yes, we realize that you may have other plugins for social sharing activated, therefore, we give you the option to disable this feature when customizing your setup.

Can I make up my own user counts?

Yes, you can manage this option at the page and post level while editing. You will find our admin panel at the bottom and you can easily update and manage your user counts.

Do I need to connect my site to your platform with an API?

No API required. Simply install WP Reactions and your emojis are ready to go!

Does this plugin provide analytics on my users reactions?

Yes. You can access your analytical data on each post or page that your reactions are activated on. Simply scroll down while editing to see the WP Reactions Dashboard.

Do you offer a Pro Version of this Plugin?

Yes. We have a tremendous upgrade with more powerful features. You can visit our website for more info

Can I arrange my emojis in any order I want?

Yes. With our Drag and Drop feature, you can arrange the order anyway you like.

sections.reviews:
Nifty Plugin - Fast and Friendly Support

By Corey Kretsinger on May 14, 2023

Such a fun little plugin to add to a website and the support is excellent. :)

Fantastic

By boristeam on April 12, 2023

simply amazing

I don't know of another plugin like this...

By Peter (pijag) on February 19, 2023

I have been looking for plugins that give users the opportunity to react to a blog entry for a long time, and I have not found a better and more useful one than WP REACTIONS.

The Lite version is a bit limited, but also very useful and sufficient in most cases. The PRO version is a complete game changer.

Congratulations to the developer and request to continue developing this excellent and one of a kind plugin.

Best wp plugin support team ever

By xyahpak on December 14, 2022

Excellent support, responds to requests immediately. My problem with this plugin was solved within a day by the support team. And in general, an excellent plugin, it performs its functions perfectly, I recommend it.

not good

By samirdric on July 1, 2022

Every little feature is Pro......Very bad experience

Absolutely Awesome Plugin

By teeboy4real on June 26, 2021

This plugin is just so cool!

There is no competition at the moment

By lesliex on June 24, 2021

By far the best reaction plugin on the market today - love it. Keep the high level!

Love it

By I am GrokGPT (kenfox101) on May 15, 2021

Love it after activating it. Thank you for creating it

Nice Plugin & Good Support

By fpleyf on December 7, 2020

WP Reactions having nice customer support and they reply very quickly. Having many customization options in the lite version. Support It! Nice Plugin to use!! Support

Best emoji plugin

By hbk747 on July 29, 2020

This is one of the only good emoji plugins on Wordpress. I tried another popular one but their customer support was pathetic. WP Reactions has amazing customer support as they reply very fast. The emojis themselves can be animated rather than static! They even have share buttons! Many customization options even in the free version. Love it!
